google-build-using-namespace.description:
Description

Finds
using
namespace
directives.

The check implements the following rule of the
Google C++ Style Guide
:

You may not use a using-directive to make all names from a namespace
available.

// Forbidden -- This pollutes the namespace.
using
namespace
foo
;

Corresponding cpplint.py check name:
build/namespaces
.
google-build-using-namespace.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
